Pre-Game Insights: Andre Russell will miss West Indies' three-match T20 International series against South Africa starting August 23, 2024, for rest and recovery.
Jason Holder and Alzarri Joseph are also missing from the West Indies squad.
Roston Chase has been named deputy to Rovman Powell.
The series will mark the return of Shimron Hetmyer and Fabian Allen to the West Indies squad.
South Africa's squad for the series includes notable absences such as Quinton de Kock, Kagiso Rabada, Keshav Maharaj, Tabraiz Shamsi, and David Miller.
West Indies head coach Daren Sammy described the series as an excellent opportunity for the team to reset and refocus with their game plan.
Miscellaneous Highlights: All three T20Is will be played at the Brian Lara Stadium in Tarouba, Trinidad, as part of double-headers with the Women's Caribbean Premier League.
